name: cfn-tool
description: AWS CloudFormation template processing and stack deployment tool.

scripts.manroff: docker run --rm -v $PWD:/app -w /app msoap/ruby-ronn ronn --manual 'CloudFormation Tools' --pipe -r cfn-tool.1.md > man/cfn-tool.1
scripts.manhtml: docker run --rm -v $PWD:/app -w /app msoap/ruby-ronn ronn --manual 'CloudFormation Tools' --pipe -5 --style=/app/cfn-tool.1.css cfn-tool.1.md > man/cfn-tool.1.html

author: micha.niskin@gmail.com
